description: 白噪音（Byebye Noise）成立于2012年，中国摇滚乐队。

songs.lyrics:
作词 : 桑上
 作曲 : 王伟

沉默回避的

At one time I had a booty call

I took another look

Wow …She wants a millionaire
I’ve got a ******* chance
To do something over my head

Every time I saw the rich man and

I want more and more
Wow… If I were a millionaire

To do something over my head
Wow …I wanna be a millionaire
Tell me so you don’t care
Anyway I – DON’T – CARE !
